p: The samples were sent to the core laboratory of the PIDIRAC surveillance system for determination of respiratory viruses (influenza viruses A–C, syncytial respiratory virus, parainfluenza viruses 1–4, adenovirus, coronavirus, rhinovirus, metapneumovirus, and bocavirus) by real-time reverse transcriptase-polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR). Individuals whose clinical samples showed coinfection and those positive for influenza virus C were excluded.
